casebody.data:
State
v.
Marshall Tristan Shaw 302P16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 8, 2016.

Mr. Bruce T. Cunningham, Jr., Mr. Robert A. Buzzard, Attorneys at Law, For Shaw, Marshall Tristan.

Ms. Kathleen N. Bolton, Assistant Attorney General, Mr. Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, Ms. Maureen Krueger, District Attorney, For State of N.C.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 23rd of August 2016 by State of NC for Extension of Time to Respond to Petition for Writ of Certiorari:

"Motion Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 8th of December 2016."
